name: [enter shadow]
description:
Everything is light. Light is. Is light. Everything. There is a light.

Bring shadow into a world that knows nothing but everlasting light. It begins a journey through dangerous shadows - to finding oneself again.

Features:

  • Minimalist visual style
  • Emotional audio
  • Reaction-base puzzle gameplay
  • 3-5 minutes of gameplay
  • 4 short levels
  • Full gamepad support
  • Voice acting

WARNING: CAMERA CONTROL SENSITIVITY IS INSANELY LOW - Sorry,  couldn't figure out how to fix this before the jam ended.

How to play/install: https://youtu.be/S7e37KIsE6Y

Development information

  • Solo project
  • Part of LuxJam (theme: light and shadow)
  • Development time: less than 15 hours over the course of 2 days
  • Resources used: Unity Standard Assets for character controls and movement animations, various CC0 sounds from Freesound.org - most of them edited

Lessons learned:

  • Dont use technical terms like "respawn" but instead use lore names like "shadow" for tags etc. to feel a connection to the game while developing it
  • Use divider objects ------------------------------------------- for the hierarchy view
  • Plan many endings, settle for one
